action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X ▢ X X
X ▢ ▢ X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ X X
X X ▢ X X
DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with X's and ▢'s. The grid has a symmetrical pattern with X's on the edges and ▢'s in the middle, except for the middle row which is entirely ▢'s.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ X X
X ▢ ▢ X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ X X
X X ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with X's and blank squares, having two identical top and bottom rows with two X's at the start and end, a row of all blank squares in the middle, and the second and fourth rows having two X's at the start and end with three blank squares in between, and the fifth row having two X's at the start and three squares at the end with two blank squares in the middle and an X at the end.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with X's and ▢'s. The grid has a symmetrical pattern with X's on the edges and ▢'s in the middle, except for the middle row which is entirely ▢'s.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any rows in your grid that have more than one X in the middle, surrounded by ▢'s?
